eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.exosuit

Interface ExosuitEventHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExosuitUpgrade
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExosuitPlate

    public interface ExosuitEventHandler
    This represents a thing that can be put into an ExosuitArmor implementer (plates, upgrades, for example, but it is only limited by your imagination) and be handled by the various provided events.

    Implementers of this interface will be handled by the ExosuitEventDelegator. These methods do not check for steam existing in the exosuit before calling the methods. So if you require steam for your handler, you must manually check within your handler.

    • Method Summary

      Called when the player gets attacked while wearing an exosuit with this installed.

    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerJump

        default void onPlayerJump(net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingEvent.LivingJumpEvent event,
                          net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer jumper,
                          net.minecraft.item.ItemStack armorStack,
                          net.minecraft.inventory.EntityEquipmentSlot slot)
        Called when the player jumps while wearing an exosuit with this installed.
        Parameters:
        event - The event.
        jumper - The player who jumped and is wearing the suit.
        armorStack - The ItemStack containing the armor piece that this is installed in.
        slot - The EntityEquipmentSlot that the armorStack is contained in.
